channel.title: Yellow Vest on
channel.description: Recent content in Yellow Vest on

item.title: Yellow Vest - Protests - Reach One Year Anniversary - No End in Site
item.description: On this segment of “By Any Means Necessary” hosts Eugene Puryear and Sean Blackmon are joined by Gilbert Mercier, Editor in Chief of News Junkie Post and the author of “The Orwellian Empire” to talk about the one year anniversary of the Yellow Vest protests, why the protests have no end in site, the normalization and legitimization of state violence in France, and how these French protests have energized protests in Lebanon and Chile.
